name: Rose Colored Lens Made By Brian Benitez
name_original: Rose Colored Lens Made By Brian Benitez
description:
WASD-  To move 

Left Shift- Run

Mouse-  Look around

P - Pause

Story:

You are trapped in a mental asylum, and you are stuck in it with her. Don't fall for her tricks, she's really good at manipulation.  You need to get out of this hell hole. You have to collect 5 bottles to forget her and to get out of this place alive! Don't listen to what she says about you. Find all those bottles and get out with your life!

Thank you for all who has supported me and this game! I hope this remaster is better than the first!
